overview: Imagine having the ultimate sweet and sexy teen girlfriend at your disposal to satisfy your every wish, desire, fantasy and perversion. Imagine that she never says no... ever. Imagine you have total control of her every moan, whimper and orgasm... Imagine she lets you take her anyway you want in every position, hard, fast, slow, imagine the ultimate girlfriend experience stop imagining. Tera Patrick, winner of best interactive movie along with Teravision, Vivid Entertainment and award winning director Axel Braun are proud to bring you an Interactive Girlfriend Sexperience starring Teravision's smokin' hot new contract star and internet phenomenon... Lupe Fuentes. Take me any way you want me, I am here for you! DVD Features: Bonus Footage Photo Gallery Behind the Scenes Trailers Dual Language - English/Spanish
title: Lupe Fuentes' Interactive Girlfriend Sexperience
